SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\n\npragma solidity ^0.8.0;\n\nimport \"../utils/Context.sol\";\n/**\n * @dev Contract module which provides a basic access control mechanism, where\n * there is an account (an owner) that can be granted exclusive access to\n * specific functions.\n *\n * By default, the owner account will be the one that deploys the contract. This\n * can later be changed with {transferOwnership}.\n *\n * This module is used through inheritance. It will make available the modifier\n * `onlyOwner`, which can be applied to your functions to restrict their use to\n * the owner.\n */\nabstract contract Ownable is Context {\n    address private _owner;\n\n    event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Initializes the contract setting the deployer as the initial owner.\n     */\n    constructor () {\n        address msgSender = _msgSender();\n        _owner = msgSender;\n        emit OwnershipTransferred(address(0), msgSender);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the address of the current owner.\n     */\n    function owner() public view virtual returns (address) {\n        return _owner;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.\n     */\n    modifier onlyOwner() {\n        require(owner() == _msgSender(), \"Ownable: caller is not the owner\");\n        _;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call\n     * `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.\n     *\n     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner,\n     * thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.\n     */\n    function renounceOwnership() public virtual onlyOwner {\n        emit OwnershipTransferred(_owner, address(0));\n        _owner = address(0);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`).\n     * Can only be called by the current owner.\n     */\n    function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public virtual onlyOwner {\n        require(newOwner != address(0), \"Ownable: new owner is the zero address\");\n        emit OwnershipTransferred(_owner, newOwner);\n        _owner = newOwner;\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x1cae4f85f114ff17b90414f5da67365b1d00337abb5bce9bf944eb78a2c0673c","license":"MIT"},"@openzeppelin/contracts/security/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\n\npragma solidity ^0.8.0;\n\n/**\n * @dev Contract module that helps prevent reentrant calls to a function.\n *\n * Inheriting from `ReentrancyGuard` will make the {nonReentrant} modifier\n * available, which can be applied to functions to make sure there are no nested\n * (reentrant) calls to them.\n *\n * Note that because there is a single `nonReentrant` guard, functions marked as\n * `nonReentrant` may not call one another. This can be worked around by making\n * those functions `private`, and then adding `external` `nonReentrant` entry\n * points to them.\n *\n * TIP: If you would like to learn more about reentrancy and alternative ways\n * to protect against it, check out our blog post\n * https://blog.openzeppelin.com/reentrancy-after-istanbul/[Reentrancy After Istanbul].\n */\nabstract contract ReentrancyGuard {\n    // Booleans are more expensive than uint256 or any type that takes up a full\n    // word because each write operation emits an extra SLOAD to first read the\n    // slot's contents, replace the bits taken up by the boolean, and then write\n    // back. This is the compiler's defense against contract upgrades and\n    // pointer aliasing, and it cannot be disabled.\n\n    // The values being non-zero value makes deployment a bit more expensive,\n    // but in exchange the refund on every call to nonReentrant will be lower in\n    // amount. Since refunds are capped to a percentage of the total\n    // transaction's gas, it is best to keep them low in cases like this one, to\n    // increase the likelihood of the full refund coming into effect.\n    uint256 private constant _NOT_ENTERED = 1;\n    uint256 private constant _ENTERED = 2;\n\n    uint256 private _status;\n\n    constructor () {\n        _status = _NOT_ENTERED;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Prevents a contract from calling itself, directly or indirectly.\n     * Calling a `nonReentrant` function from another `nonReentrant`\n     * function is not supported. It is possible to prevent this from happening\n     * by making the `nonReentrant` function external, and make it call a\n     * `private` function that does the actual work.\n     */\n    modifier nonReentrant() {\n        // On the first call to nonReentrant, _notEntered will be true\n        require(_status != _ENTERED, \"ReentrancyGuard: reentrant call\");\n\n        // Any calls to nonReentrant after this point will fail\n        _status = _ENTERED;\n\n        _;\n\n        // By storing the original value once again, a refund is triggered (see\n        // https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2200)\n        _status = _NOT_ENTERED;\n    }\n}\n","keccak256":"0x1278c76b840063ff5e14a2d7c5707812c1eabc2342ed040bf862c2d7552102fe","license":"MIT"},"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC1155/IERC1155.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: from `from` to `to` by `operator`.\n     */\n    event TransferSingle(address indexed operator, address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256 id, uint256 value);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Equivalent to multiple {TransferSingle} events, where `operator`, `from` and `to` are the same for all\n     * transfers.\n     */\n    event TransferBatch(address indexed operator, address indexed from, address indexed to, uint256[] ids, uint256[] values);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Emitted when `account` grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer their tokens, according to\n     * `approved`.\n     */\n    event ApprovalForAll(address indexed account, address indexed operator, bool approved);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Emitted when the URI for token type `id` changes to `value`, if it is a non-programmatic URI.\n     *\n     * If an {URI} event was emitted for `id`, the standard\n     * https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1155#metadata-extensions[guarantees] that `value` will equal the value\n     * returned by {IERC1155MetadataURI-uri}.\n     */\n    event URI(string value, uint256 indexed id);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Returns the amount of tokens of token type `id` owned by `account`.\n     *\n     * Requirements:\n     *\n     * - `account` cannot be the zero address.\n     */\n    function balanceOf(address account, uint256 id) external view returns (uint256);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev xref:ROOT:erc1155.adoc#batch-operations[Batched] version of {balanceOf}.\n     *\n     * Requirements:\n     *\n     * - `accounts` and `ids` must have the same length.\n     */\n    function balanceOfBatch(address[] calldata accounts, uint256[] calldata ids) external view returns (uint256[] memory);\n\n    /**\n     * @dev Grants or revokes permission to `operator` to transfer the caller's tokens, according to `approved`,\n     *\n     * Emits an {ApprovalForAll} event.\n     *\n     * Requirements:\n     *\n     * - `operator` cannot be the caller.\n     */\n    function years).\r\n *\r\n * Key Features:\r\n * - ETH and USDC payments\r\n * - EIP-2612 permit for gasless USDC approval\r\n * - ERC-4337 Account Abstraction compatible\r\n * - Optional AA wallet deployment with domain mint\r\n * - Works with Circle Paymaster for gas sponsorship\r\n */\r\ncontract AgentRegistrarController is\r\n    IAgentRegistrar,\r\n    Ownable,\r\n    IERC165,\r\n    ReverseClaimer,\r\n    ReentrancyGuard\r\n{\r\n    using StringUtils for *;\r\n    using Address for address;\r\n    using SafeERC20 for IERC20;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Constants ============\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Lifetime duration: 100 years in seconds\r\n    uint256 public constant LIFETIME_DURATION = 100 * 365 days;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Maximum names in a single batch registration\r\n    uint256 public constant MAX_BATCH_SIZE = 50;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Minimum commitment age (10 minutes)\r\n    uint256 public constant MIN_COMMITMENT_AGE = 10 minutes;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Maximum commitment age (24 hours)\r\n    uint256 public constant MAX_COMMITMENT_AGE = 24 hours;\r\n\r\n    // ============ State Variables ============\r\n\r\n    BaseRegistrarImplementation public immutable base;\r\n    IAgentPriceOracle public immutable prices;\r\n    ReverseRegistrar public immutable reverseRegistrar;\r\n    INameWrapper public immutable nameWrapper;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice USDC token address on Base\r\n    IERC20 public immutable usdc;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice ReferralVerifier for referral rewards\r\n    ReferralVerifier public referralVerifier;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Max referral percentage (30%)\r\n    uint256 public constant MAX_REFERRAL_PCT = 30;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Mapping of commitments to timestamps\r\n    mapping(bytes32 => uint256) public commitments;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Whether to skip commit-reveal for agent names\r\n    bool public agentModeEnabled;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Total number of names minted\r\n    uint256 public totalMints;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Account factory for deploying AA wallets\r\n    IAccountFactory public accountFactory;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Treasury address for USDC payments\r\n    address public treasury;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Total USDC volume processed (6 decimals)\r\n    uint256 public totalVolumeUSDC;\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Total agent-specific registrations\r\n    uint256 public totalAgentRegistrations;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Events ============\r\n\r\n    event CommitmentMade(bytes32 indexed commitment, address indexed sender);\r\n    event AgentModeToggled(bool enabled);\r\n    event FundsWithdrawn(address indexed to, uint256 amount);\r\n    event USDCWithdrawn(address indexed to, uint256 amount);\r\n\r\n    // ============ Constructor ============\r\n\r\n    constructor(\r\n        BaseRegistrarImplementation _base,\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle _prices,\r\n        ReverseRegistrar _reverseRegistrar,\r\n        INameWrapper _nameWrapper,\r\n        IERC20 _usdc,\r\n        ReferralVerifier _referralVerifier\r\n    ) ReverseClaimer(_base.ens(), msg.sender) {\r\n        base = _base;\r\n        prices = _prices;\r\n        reverseRegistrar = _reverseRegistrar;\r\n        nameWrapper = _nameWrapper;\r\n        usdc = _usdc;\r\n        referralVerifier = _referralVerifier;\r\n        agentModeEnabled = true; // Enable agent mode by default\r\n        treasury = msg.sender; // Default treasury to deployer\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Admin Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Toggle agent mode (skip commit-reveal for agent names)\r\n     */\r\n    function setAgentMode(bool enabled) external onlyOwner {\r\n        agentModeEnabled = enabled;\r\n        emit AgentModeToggled(enabled);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Withdraw ETH from the contract\r\n     */\r\n    function withdraw(address payable to) external onlyOwner {\r\n        uint256 balance = address(this).balance;\r\n        to.transfer(balance);\r\n        emit FundsWithdrawn(to, balance);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Withdraw USDC from the contract\r\n     */\r\n    function withdrawUSDC(address to) external onlyOwner {\r\n        uint256 balance = usdc.balanceOf(address(this));\r\n        usdc.safeTransfer(to, balance);\r\n        emit USDCWithdrawn(to, balance);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Set the referral verifier contract\r\n     */\r\n    function setReferralVerifier(address _verifier) external onlyOwner {\r\n        referralVerifier = ReferralVerifier(payable(_verifier));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Set the account factory for AA wallet deployment\r\n     */\r\n    function setAccountFactory(address _factory) external onlyOwner {\r\n        accountFactory = IAccountFactory(_factory);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Set the treasury address for USDC payments\r\n     */\r\n    function setTreasury(address _treasury) external onlyOwner {\r\n        treasury = _treasury;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ External View Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function available(\r\n        string calldata name\r\n    ) external view override returns (bool) {\r\n        bytes32 label = keccak256(bytes(name));\r\n        return valid(name) && base.available(uint256(label));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function valid(string calldata name) public pure override returns (bool) {\r\n        return name.strlen() >= 1;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Get the rent price for a name (ETH + USD)\r\n     */\r\n    function rentPrice(\r\n        string calldata name\r\n    )\r\n        external\r\n        view\r\n        returns (uint256 priceWei, uint256 priceUsd, bool isAgentName)\r\n    {\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(name);\r\n        return (price.priceWei, price.priceUsd, price.isAgentName);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function getPrice(\r\n        string calldata name\r\n    ) external view override returns (uint256 priceUSDC, bool isAgentName) {\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(name);\r\n        // Convert from 18 decimals to 6 decimals (USDC)\r\n        priceUSDC = price.priceUsd / 1e12;\r\n        isAgentName = price.isAgentName;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function getWalletAddress(\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 salt\r\n    ) external view override returns (address) {\r\n        require(address(accountFactory) != address(0), \"No account factory\");\r\n        return accountFactory.getAddress(owner, salt);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function makeCommitment(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req\r\n    ) public pure override returns (bytes32) {\r\n        if (req.data.length > 0 && req.resolver == address(0)) {\r\n            revert ResolverRequiredWhenDataSupplied();\r\n        }\r\n        return\r\n            keccak256(\r\n                abi.encode(\r\n                    req.name,\r\n                    req.owner,\r\n                    req.secret,\r\n                    req.resolver,\r\n                    req.data,\r\n                    req.reverseRecord,\r\n                    req.ownerControlledFuses\r\n                )\r\n            );\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ External Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function commit(bytes32 commitment) external override {\r\n        if (commitments[commitment] + MAX_COMMITMENT_AGE >= block.timestamp) {\r\n            revert UnexpiredCommitmentExists(commitment);\r\n        }\r\n        commitments[commitment] = block.timestamp;\r\n        emit CommitmentMade(commitment, msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function register(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req,\r\n        ReferralVerifier.ReferralData calldata referralData,\r\n        bytes calldata referralSignature\r\n    ) external payable override {\r\n        uint256 cost = _executeRegistration(req);\r\n\r\n        if (msg.value < cost) {\r\n            revert InsufficientValue();\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Handle referral reward\r\n        _handleReferral(referralData, referralSignature, cost);\r\n\r\n        // Refund excess\r\n        if (msg.value > cost) {\r\n            payable(msg.sender).transfer(msg.value - cost);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        totalMints++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function registerWithUSDC(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req\r\n    ) external override nonReentrant {\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(req.name);\r\n\r\n        // USDC has 6 decimals, priceUsd has 18 decimals\r\n        uint256 usdcAmount = price.priceUsd / 1e12;\r\n\r\n        // Transfer USDC to treasury (or contract if no treasury set)\r\n        address recipient = treasury != address(0) ? treasury : address(this);\r\n        usdc.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, recipient, usdcAmount);\r\n\r\n        _executeRegistrationInternal(req, price.isAgentName);\r\n\r\n        // Deploy AA wallet if requested\r\n        if (req.deployWallet && address(accountFactory) != address(0)) {\r\n            _deployAgentWallet(req.owner, req.walletSalt, req.name);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Update USDC stats\r\n        totalVolumeUSDC += usdcAmount;\r\n        if (price.isAgentName) {\r\n            totalAgentRegistrations++;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        totalMints++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function registerWithPermit(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req,\r\n        PermitData calldata permit\r\n    ) external override nonReentrant {\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(req.name);\r\n        uint256 usdcAmount = price.priceUsd / 1e12;\r\n\r\n        // Execute permit (gasless USDC approval)\r\n        try\r\n            IERC20Permit(address(usdc)).permit(\r\n                msg.sender,\r\n                address(this),\r\n                usdcAmount,\r\n                permit.deadline,\r\n                permit.v,\r\n                permit.r,\r\n                permit.s\r\n            )\r\n        {} catch {\r\n            // Permit might already be used or pre-approved\r\n        }\r\n        // Transfer USDC to treasury (or contract if no treasury set)\r\n        address recipient = treasury != address(0) ? treasury : address(this);\r\n        usdc.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, recipient, usdcAmount);\r\n\r\n        _executeRegistrationInternal(req, price.isAgentName);\r\n\r\n        // Deploy AA wallet if requested\r\n        if (req.deployWallet && address(accountFactory) != address(0)) {\r\n            _deployAgentWallet(req.owner, req.walletSalt, req.name);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Update USDC stats\r\n        totalVolumeUSDC += usdcAmount;\r\n        if (price.isAgentName) {\r\n            totalAgentRegistrations++;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        totalMints++;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function batchRegisterWithUSDC(\r\n        RegisterRequest[] calldata requests\r\n    ) external override nonReentrant {\r\n        if (requests.length > MAX_BATCH_SIZE) {\r\n            revert BatchTooLarge(requests.length);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        uint256 totalCost = 0;\r\n\r\n        // Calculate total and validate all are agent names\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < requests.length; i++) {\r\n            IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(\r\n                requests[i].name\r\n            );\r\n            if (!price.isAgentName) {\r\n                revert BatchOnlyForAgentNames(requests[i].name);\r\n            }\r\n            totalCost += price.priceUsd / 1e12;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Transfer total USDC upfront\r\n        address recipient = treasury != address(0) ? treasury : address(this);\r\n        usdc.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender, recipient, totalCost);\r\n\r\n        // Execute registrations\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < requests.length; i++) {\r\n            IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(\r\n                requests[i].name\r\n            );\r\n\r\n            _executeRegistrationInternal(requests[i], price.isAgentName);\r\n\r\n            // Deploy AA wallet if requested\r\n            if (\r\n                requests[i].deployWallet &&\r\n                address(accountFactory) != address(0)\r\n            ) {\r\n                _deployAgentWallet(\r\n                    requests[i].owner,\r\n                    requests[i].walletSalt,\r\n                    requests[i].name\r\n                );\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            totalAgentRegistrations++;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        totalVolumeUSDC += totalCost;\r\n        totalMints += requests.length;\r\n\r\n        emit BatchRegistered(requests.length, msg.sender, totalCost);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @inheritdoc IAgentRegistrar\r\n     */\r\n    function batchRegister(\r\n        RegisterRequest[] calldata requests\r\n    ) external payable override {\r\n        if (requests.length > MAX_BATCH_SIZE) {\r\n            revert BatchTooLarge(requests.length);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        uint256 totalCost = 0;\r\n\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < requests.length; i++) {\r\n            totalCost += _executeRegistration(requests[i]);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        if (msg.value < totalCost) {\r\n            revert InsufficientValue();\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Refund excess\r\n        if (msg.value > totalCost) {\r\n            payable(msg.sender).transfer(msg.value - totalCost);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        totalMints += requests.length;\r\n\r\n        emit BatchRegistered(requests.length, msg.sender, totalCost);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ IERC165 ============\r\n\r\n    function supportsInterface(\r\n        bytes4 interfaceID\r\n    ) public pure override returns (bool) {\r\n        return\r\n            interfaceID == type(IERC165).interfaceId ||\r\n            interfaceID == type(IAgentRegistrar).interfaceId;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Internal Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Deploy an AA wallet for an agent via the account factory\r\n     */\r\n    function _deployAgentWallet(\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 salt,\r\n        string calldata domainName\r\n    ) internal returns (address wallet) {\r\n        wallet = accountFactory.createAccount(owner, salt);\r\n        emit AgentWalletDeployed(owner, wallet, domainName);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Execute a single registration with ETH payment\r\n     */\r\n    function _executeRegistration(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req\r\n    ) internal returns (uint256 cost) {\r\n        IAgentPriceOracle.AgentPrice memory price = prices.getPrice(req.name);\r\n        cost = price.priceWei;\r\n\r\n        _executeRegistrationInternal(req, price.isAgentName);\r\n\r\n        // Deploy AA wallet if requested\r\n        if (req.deployWallet && address(accountFactory) != address(0)) {\r\n            _deployAgentWallet(req.owner, req.walletSalt, req.name);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return cost;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Internal registration logic\r\n     */\r\n    function _executeRegistrationInternal(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req,\r\n        bool isAgentName\r\n    ) internal {\r\n        // Validate name\r\n        if (!valid(req.name)) {\r\n            revert InvalidName(req.name);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        bytes32 label = keccak256(bytes(req.name));\r\n\r\n        // Check availability\r\n        if (!base.available(uint256(label))) {\r\n            revert NameNotAvailable(req.name);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Check commitment (skip for agent names if agent mode is enabled)\r\n        if (!(agentModeEnabled && isAgentName)) {\r\n            bytes32 commitment = makeCommitment(req);\r\n            _validateCommitment(commitment);\r\n            delete commitments[commitment];\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Register through name wrapper (lifetime = 100 years)\r\n        uint256 expires = nameWrapper.registerAndWrapETH2LD(\r\n            req.name,\r\n            req.owner,\r\n            LIFETIME_DURATION,\r\n            req.resolver,\r\n            req.ownerControlledFuses\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        // Set resolver records if provided\r\n        if (req.data.length > 0) {\r\n            _setRecords(req.resolver, label, req.data);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Set reverse record if requested\r\n        if (req.reverseRecord) {\r\n            _setReverseRecord(req.name, req.resolver, msg.sender);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        emit NameRegistered(\r\n            req.name,\r\n            label,\r\n            req.owner,\r\n            expires,\r\n            0 // No premium\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Validate a commitment\r\n     */\r\n    function _validateCommitment(bytes32 commitment) internal view {\r\n        uint256 commitmentTime = commitments[commitment];\r\n\r\n        if (commitmentTime + MIN_COMMITMENT_AGE > block.timestamp) {\r\n            revert CommitmentTooNew(commitment);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        if (commitmentTime + MAX_COMMITMENT_AGE <= block.timestamp) {\r\n            revert CommitmentTooOld(commitment);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Set resolver records\r\n     */\r\n    function _setRecords(\r\n        address resolver,\r\n        bytes32 label,\r\n        bytes[] calldata data\r\n    ) internal {\r\n        bytes32 nodehash = keccak256(abi.encodePacked(base.baseNode(), label));\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {\r\n            // Resolver must be the new name's resolver\r\n            resolver.functionCall(data[i]);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Set reverse record\r\n     */\r\n    function _setReverseRecord(\r\n        string calldata name,\r\n        address resolver,\r\n        address owner\r\n    ) internal {\r\n        reverseRegistrar.setNameForAddr(\r\n            owner,\r\n            owner,\r\n            resolver,\r\n            string.concat(name, \".safu\")\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Handle referral reward for registration\r\n     */\r\n    function _handleReferral(\r\n        ReferralVerifier.ReferralData calldata referralData,\r\n        bytes calldata referralSignature,\r\n        uint256 totalPrice\r\n    ) internal {\r\n        if (\r\n            address(referralVerifier) == address(0) ||\r\n            referralData.referrer == address(0) ||\r\n            referralSignature.length == 0\r\n        ) return;\r\n\r\n        uint256 amount = (totalPrice * MAX_REFERRAL_PCT) / 100;\r\n\r\n        referralVerifier.processReferral{value: amount}(\r\n            referralData,\r\n            referralSignature,\r\n            totalPrice,\r\n            address(0), // ETH payment\r\n            false // not fiat\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Receive ============\r\n\r\n    receive() external payable {}\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x44b1d6ac0826c64d4dece734198cd80f83c70828ae68bfda08735192102390bc","license":"MIT"},"contracts/agent-registrar/interfaces/IAgentPriceOracle.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title IAgentPriceOracle\r\n * @notice Interface for the agent-aware price oracle\r\n */\r\ninterface IAgentPriceOracle {\r\n    struct AgentPrice {\r\n        uint256 priceWei;    // Price in wei (ETH)\r\n        uint256 priceUsd;    // Price in USD with 18 decimals\r\n        bool isAgentName;    // Whether this qualifies for agent pricing\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Get the price for registering a name\r\n     * @param name The name to check (without .safu suffix)\r\n     * @return AgentPrice struct with pricing details\r\n     */\r\n    function getPrice(string calldata name) external view returns (AgentPrice memory);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Check if a name qualifies as an agent name\r\n     * @param name The name to check (without .safu suffix)\r\n     * @return True if the name qualifies for agent pricing\r\n     */\r\n    function isAgentName(string calldata name) external view returns (bool);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Get the count of pattern categories a name matches\r\n     * @param name The name to check\r\n     * @return Number of matching pattern categories (0-5)\r\n     */\r\n    function getPatternMatchCount(string calldata name) external view returns (uint256);\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0xba82559b7ec8c6dff4ee75ba217cec51683cdc2de8a8721bad60728d7a1e67d0","license":"MIT"},"contracts/agent-registrar/interfaces/IAgentRegistrar.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {ReferralVerifier} from \"../../ethregistrar/ReferralVerifier.sol\";\r\n\r\n/**\r\n * @title IAgentRegistrar\r\n * @notice Interface for the agent registrar controller\r\n * @dev Supports USDC-only payments, ERC-4337 Account Abstraction,\r\n *      Circle Paymaster for gasless transactions, and optional AA wallet deployment\r\n */\r\ninterface IAgentRegistrar {\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Registration request structure\r\n     */\r\n    struct RegisterRequest {\r\n        string name; // Name to register (without .safu suffix)\r\n        address owner; // Owner of the registered name\r\n        bytes32 secret; // Secret for commit-reveal (can be zero for agent names in agent mode)\r\n        address resolver; // Resolver address to set\r\n        bytes[] data; // Resolver data to set during registration\r\n        bool reverseRecord; // Whether to set reverse record\r\n        uint16 ownerControlledFuses; // Fuses to set on the wrapped name\r\n        bool deployWallet; // Whether to deploy an AA wallet for the agent\r\n        uint256 walletSalt; // Salt for deterministic AA wallet address (CREATE2)\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice EIP-2612 permit data for gasless USDC approval\r\n     */\r\n    struct PermitData {\r\n        uint256 deadline;\r\n        uint8 v;\r\n        bytes32 r;\r\n        bytes32 s;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Emitted when a name is registered\r\n     */\r\n    event NameRegistered(\r\n        string name,\r\n        bytes32 indexed label,\r\n        address indexed owner,\r\n        uint256 cost,\r\n        uint256 expires\r\n    );\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Emitted when a batch registration completes\r\n     */\r\n    event BatchRegistered(\r\n        uint256 count,\r\n        address indexed owner,\r\n        uint256 totalCost\r\n    );\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Emitted when an AA wallet is deployed for an agent\r\n     */\r\n    event AgentWalletDeployed(\r\n        address indexed owner,\r\n        address indexed wallet,\r\n        string domainName\r\n    );\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Register a name with ETH payment\r\n     * @param req The registration request\r\n     * @param referralData The referral data\r\n     * @param referralSignature The referral signature\r\n     */\r\n    function register(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req,\r\n        ReferralVerifier.ReferralData calldata referralData,\r\n        bytes calldata referralSignature\r\n    ) external payable;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Register a name with USDC payment\r\n     * @param req The registration request\r\n     */\r\n    function registerWithUSDC(RegisterRequest calldata req) external;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Register a name with USDC using EIP-2612 permit (gasless approval)\r\n     * @dev Best for AA wallets - single transaction approval + mint\r\n     * @param req The registration request\r\n     * @param permit EIP-2612 permit data for USDC approval\r\n     */\r\n    function registerWithPermit(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req,\r\n        PermitData calldata permit\r\n    ) external;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Batch register names with USDC (agent names only)\r\n     * @param requests Array of registration requests\r\n     */\r\n    function batchRegisterWithUSDC(\r\n        RegisterRequest[] calldata requests\r\n    ) external;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Register multiple names in a single transaction\r\n     * @param requests Array of registration requests\r\n     */\r\n    function batchRegister(\r\n        RegisterRequest[] calldata requests\r\n    ) external payable;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Commit to a name registration (for commit-reveal)\r\n     * @param commitment The commitment hash\r\n     */\r\n    function commit(bytes32 commitment) external;\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Make a commitment hash from registration parameters\r\n     * @param req The registration request\r\n     * @return The commitment hash\r\n     */\r\n    function makeCommitment(\r\n        RegisterRequest calldata req\r\n    ) external pure returns (bytes32);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Check if a name is available for registration\r\n     * @param name The name to check\r\n     * @return True if the name is available\r\n     */\r\n    function available(string calldata name) external view returns (bool);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Check if a name is valid (meets minimum requirements)\r\n     * @param name The name to check\r\n     * @return True if the name is valid\r\n     */\r\n    function valid(string calldata name) external pure returns (bool);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Get registration price in USDC (6 decimals)\r\n     * @param name The name to price\r\n     * @return priceUSDC Price in USDC (6 decimals)\r\n     * @return isAgentName Whether the name qualifies as an agent name\r\n     */\r\n    function getPrice(\r\n        string calldata name\r\n    ) external view returns (uint256 priceUSDC, bool isAgentName);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Get the deterministic AA wallet address for an owner\r\n     * @param owner The wallet owner\r\n     * @param salt The CREATE2 salt\r\n     * @return The predicted wallet address\r\n     */\r\n    function getWalletAddress(\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 salt\r\n    ) external view returns (address);\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x41d15ae5bba63e6add250c8ddeec60d50e585b9f5fe8f3bea8ed7060c2264cd5","license":"MIT"},"contracts/ethregistrar/BaseRegistrarImplementation.sol":{"content":"pragma solidity >=0.8.4;\r\n\r\nimport \"../registry/ENS.sol\";\r\nimport \"./IBaseRegistrar.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol\";\r\nimport {IERC2981} from \"../utils/IERC2981.sol\";\r\n\r\ncontract BaseRegistrarImplementation is\r\n    ERC721,\r\n    IBaseRegistrar,\r\n    Ownable,\r\n    IERC2981\r\n{\r\n    // ============ Royalty Constants ============\r\n    uint96 public constant ROYALTY_BPS = 500; // 5% = 500 basis points\r\n    uint96 private constant BPS_DENOMINATOR = 10000;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Royalty State ============\r\n    address public royaltyReceiver;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Royalty Events ============\r\n    event RoyaltyReceiverUpdated(\r\n        address indexed oldReceiver,\r\n        address indexed newReceiver\r\n    );\r\n    // A map of expiry times\r\n    mapping(uint256 => uint256) expiries;\r\n    // The ENS registry\r\n    ENS public ens;\r\n    // The namehash of the TLD this registrar owns (eg, .eth)\r\n    bytes32 public baseNode;\r\n    // A map of addresses that are authorised to register and renew names.\r\n    mapping(address => bool) public controllers;\r\n    uint256 public constant GRACE_PERIOD = 30 days;\r\n    uint256 public constant LIFETIME = 31536000000;\r\n    bytes4 private constant INTERFACE_META_ID =\r\n        bytes4(keccak256(\"supportsInterface(bytes4)\"));\r\n    bytes4 private constant ERC721_ID =\r\n        bytes4(\r\n            keccak256(\"balanceOf(address)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"ownerOf(uint256)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"approve(address,uint256)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"getApproved(uint256)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"isApprovedForAll(address,address)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)\") ^\r\n                keccak256(\"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)\")\r\n        );\r\n    bytes4 private constant RECLAIM_ID =\r\n        bytes4(keccak256(\"reclaim(uint256,address)\"));\r\n\r\n    /// v2.1.3 version of _isApprovedOrOwner which calls ownerOf(tokenId) and takes grace period into consideration instead of ERC721.ownerOf(tokenId);\r\n    /// https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/blob/v2.1.3/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol#L187\r\n    /// @dev Returns whether the given spender can transfer a given token ID\r\n    /// @param spender address of the spender to query\r\n    /// @param tokenId uint256 ID of the token to be transferred\r\n    /// @return bool whether the msg.sender is approved for the given token ID,\r\n    ///              is an operator of the owner, or is the owner of the token\r\n    function _isApprovedOrOwner(\r\n        address spender,\r\n        uint256 tokenId\r\n    ) internal view override returns (bool) {\r\n        address owner = ownerOf(tokenId);\r\n        return (spender == owner ||\r\n            getApproved(tokenId) == spender ||\r\n            isApprovedForAll(owner, spender));\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    constructor(ENS _ens, bytes32 _baseNode) ERC721(\"\", \"\") {\r\n        ens = _ens;\r\n        baseNode = _baseNode;\r\n        Ownable(msg.sender);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    modifier live() {\r\n        require(ens.owner(baseNode) == address(this));\r\n        _;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    modifier onlyController() {\r\n        require(controllers[msg.sender]);\r\n        _;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @dev Gets the owner of the specified token ID. Names become unowned\r\n    ///      when their registration expires.\r\n    /// @param tokenId uint256 ID of the token to query the owner of\r\n    /// @return address currently marked as the owner of the given token ID\r\n    function ownerOf(\r\n        uint256 tokenId\r\n    ) public view override(IERC721, ERC721) returns (address) {\r\n        require(expiries[tokenId] > block.timestamp);\r\n        return super.ownerOf(tokenId);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Authorises a controller, who can register and renew domains.\r\n    function addController(address controller) external override onlyOwner {\r\n        controllers[controller] = true;\r\n        emit ControllerAdded(controller);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Revoke controller permission for an address.\r\n    function removeController(address controller) external override onlyOwner {\r\n        controllers[controller] = false;\r\n        emit ControllerRemoved(controller);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Set the resolver for the TLD this registrar manages.\r\n    function setResolver(address resolver) external override onlyOwner {\r\n        ens.setResolver(baseNode, resolver);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Returns the expiration timestamp of the specified id.\r\n    function nameExpires(uint256 id) external view override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return expiries[id];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // Returns true iff the specified name is available for registration.\r\n    function available(uint256 id) public view override returns (bool) {\r\n        // Not available if it's registered here or in its grace period.\r\n        return expiries[id] + GRACE_PERIOD < block.timestamp;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @dev Register a name.\r\n    /// @param id The token ID (keccak256 of the label).\r\n    /// @param owner The address that should own the registration.\r\n    /// @param duration Duration in seconds for the registration.\r\n    function register(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    ) external virtual override returns (uint256) {\r\n        return _register(id, owner, duration, true);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @dev Register a name, without modifying the registry.\r\n    /// @param id The token ID (keccak256 of the label).\r\n    /// @param owner The address that should own the registration.\r\n    /// @param duration Duration in seconds for the registration.\r\n    function registerOnly(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    ) external returns (uint256) {\r\n        return _register(id, owner, duration, false);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function _register(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 duration,\r\n        bool updateRegistry\r\n    ) internal live onlyController returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(available(id));\r\n        require(\r\n            block.timestamp + duration + GRACE_PERIOD >\r\n                block.timestamp + GRACE_PERIOD\r\n        ); // Prevent future overflow\r\n\r\n        uint256 expiration;\r\n\r\n        if (duration == 31536000000) {\r\n            // Lifetime registration\r\n            expiration = LIFETIME;\r\n        } else {\r\n            // Annual registration\r\n            expiration = block.timestamp + duration;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        expiries[id] = expiration;\r\n        if (_exists(id)) {\r\n            // Name was previously owned, and expired\r\n            _burn(id);\r\n        }\r\n        _mint(owner, id);\r\n        if (updateRegistry) {\r\n            ens.setSubnodeOwner(baseNode, bytes32(id), owner);\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        emit NameRegistered(id, owner, expiration);\r\n\r\n        return expiration;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function renew(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    ) external virtual override live onlyController returns (uint256) {\r\n        require(expiries[id] + GRACE_PERIOD >= block.timestamp); // Name must be registered here or in grace period\r\n        require(expiries[id] != LIFETIME, \"Lifetime names cannot be renewed\");\r\n        require(\r\n            expiries[id] + duration + GRACE_PERIOD > duration + GRACE_PERIOD\r\n        ); // Prevent future overflow\r\n        if (duration == 31536000000) {\r\n            // Lifetime registration\r\n            expiries[id] = LIFETIME;\r\n            emit NameRenewed(id, expiries[id]);\r\n            return expiries[id];\r\n        } else {\r\n            expiries[id] += duration;\r\n        }\r\n        emit NameRenewed(id, expiries[id]);\r\n        return expiries[id];\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @dev Reclaim ownership of a name in ENS, if you own it in the registrar.\r\n    function reclaim(uint256 id, address owner) external override live {\r\n        require(_isApprovedOrOwner(msg.sender, id));\r\n        ens.setSubnodeOwner(baseNode, bytes32(id), owner);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function supportsInterface(\r\n        bytes4 interfaceID\r\n    ) public view override(ERC721, IERC165) returns (bool) {\r\n        return\r\n            interfaceID == INTERFACE_META_ID ||\r\n            interfaceID == ERC721_ID ||\r\n            interfaceID == RECLAIM_ID ||\r\n            interfaceID == type(IERC2981).interfaceId;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ ERC-2981 Royalty Implementation ============\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Returns royalty info for a given token and sale price\r\n     * @param salePrice The sale price of the NFT\r\n     * @return receiver Address to receive royalty\r\n     * @return royaltyAmount The royalty amount (5% of sale price)\r\n     */\r\n    function royaltyInfo(\r\n        uint256,\r\n        uint256 salePrice\r\n    ) external view override returns (address receiver, uint256 royaltyAmount) {\r\n        receiver = royaltyReceiver;\r\n        royaltyAmount = (salePrice * ROYALTY_BPS) / BPS_DENOMINATOR;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @notice Update the royalty receiver address\r\n     * @param _newReceiver New address to receive royalties\r\n     */\r\n    function setRoyaltyReceiver(address _newReceiver) external onlyOwner {\r\n        require(_newReceiver != address(0), \"Invalid receiver\");\r\n        address oldReceiver = royaltyReceiver;\r\n        royaltyReceiver = _newReceiver;\r\n        emit RoyaltyReceiverUpdated(oldReceiver, _newReceiver);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function _exists(uint256 tokenId) internal view override returns (bool) {\r\n        return super._exists(tokenId);\r\n    }\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x4ea7be90e175930a2f65833ab19bc37c09290e7fa31aca089062eab45a40c93a"},"contracts/ethregistrar/IBaseRegistrar.sol":{"content":"import \"../registry/ENS.sol\";\r\nimport \"./IBaseRegistrar.sol\";\r\nimport \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/IERC721.sol\";\r\n\r\ninterface IBaseRegistrar is IERC721 {\r\n    event ControllerAdded(address indexed controller);\r\n    event ControllerRemoved(address indexed controller);\r\n    event NameMigrated(\r\n        uint256 indexed id,\r\n        address indexed owner,\r\n        uint256 expires\r\n    );\r\n    event NameRegistered(\r\n        uint256 indexed id,\r\n        address indexed owner,\r\n        uint256 expires\r\n    );\r\n    event NameRenewed(uint256 indexed id, uint256 expires);\r\n\r\n    // Authorises a controller, who can register and renew domains.\r\n    function addController(address controller) external;\r\n\r\n    // Revoke controller permission for an address.\r\n    function removeController(address controller) external;\r\n\r\n    // Set the resolver for the TLD this registrar manages.\r\n    function setResolver(address resolver) external;\r\n\r\n    // Returns the expiration timestamp of the specified label hash.\r\n    function nameExpires(uint256 id) external view returns (uint256);\r\n\r\n    // Returns true if the specified name is available for registration.\r\n    function available(uint256 id) external view returns (bool);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Register a name.\r\n     */\r\n    function register(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        address owner,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    ) external returns (uint256);\r\n\r\n    function renew(\r\n        uint256 id,\r\n        uint256 duration\r\n    ) external returns (uint256);\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Reclaim ownership of a name in ENS, if you own it in the registrar.\r\n     */\r\n    function reclaim(uint256 id, address owner) external;\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0xe812f54069f9381e81fe0a15d189262b19b5f2f1e9e451666a3305e939edc29f"},"contracts/ethregistrar/ReferralVerifier.sol":{"content":"// SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma solidity ^0.8.17;\r\n\r\nimport {Ownable} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol\";\r\nimport {ECDSA} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol\";\r\nimport {SafeERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol\";\r\nimport {IERC20} from \"@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol\";\r\n\r\ninterface INameWrapper {\r\n    function ownerOf(uint256 id) external view returns (address);\r\n}\r\n\r\ninterface IBaseRegistrar {\r\n    function nameExpires(uint256 id) external view returns (uint256);\r\n}\r\n\r\ncontract ReferralVerifier is Ownable {\r\n    using SafeERC20 for IERC20;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Constants ============\r\n    uint256 public constant BASE_PCT = 25;\r\n    uint256 public constant BONUS_PCT = 30;\r\n    uint256 public constant BONUS_THRESHOLD = 5;\r\n\r\n    // ============ State ============\r\n    address public signer;\r\n    INameWrapper public nameWrapper;\r\n    IBaseRegistrar public baseRegistrar;\r\n\r\n    mapping(bytes32 => bool) public usedNonces;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public referralCount;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public totalEarnings;\r\n\r\n    // Referral relationship storage\r\n    // referredDomainHash => ReferralInfo\r\n    struct ReferralInfo {\r\n        bytes32 referrerCodeHash; // The domain hash used as referral code (e.g., hash of \"vitalik\")\r\n        address originalReferrer; // The address that owned the referral code at registration time\r\n    }\r\n    mapping(bytes32 => ReferralInfo) public domainReferrals;\r\n\r\n    // Fiat tracking\r\n    uint256 public untrackedFiatEarnings;\r\n    mapping(address => uint256) public pendingFiatEarnings;\r\n\r\n    // Controllers\r\n    mapping(address => bool) public controllers;\r\n\r\n    // ============ Events ============\r\n    event ReferralPaid(\r\n        address indexed referrer,\r\n        address indexed registrant,\r\n        bytes32 indexed nameHash,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        address token,\r\n        bool isFiat\r\n    );\r\n    event RenewalReferralPaid(\r\n        address indexed referrer,\r\n        bytes32 indexed nameHash,\r\n        bytes32 indexed referrerCodeHash,\r\n        uint256 amount,\r\n        address token,\r\n        bool isFiat\r\n    );\r\n    event RenewalReferralSkipped(\r\n        bytes32 indexed nameHash,\r\n        bytes32 indexed referrerCodeHash,\r\n        address originalReferrer,\r\n        address currentOwner,\r\n        string reason\r\n    );\r\n    event ReferrerAssigned(\r\n        bytes32 indexed nameHash,\r\n        bytes32 indexed referrerCodeHash,\r\n        address indexed referrer\r\n    );\r\n    event SignerUpdated(address oldSigner, address newSigner);\r\n    event ExcessRefunded(address indexed to, uint256 amount);\r\n    event ControllerUpdated(address indexed controller, bool allowed);\r\n\r\n    // ============ Errors ============\r\n    error InvalidSignature();\r\n    error ExpiredSignature();\r\n    error NonceAlreadyUsed();\r\n    error SelfReferral();\r\n    error InvalidAddress();\r\n    error TransferFailed();\r\n    error NotController();\r\n\r\n    // ============ Structs ============\r\n    struct ReferralData {\r\n        address referrer;\r\n        address registrant;\r\n        bytes32 nameHash; // Hash of domain being registered\r\n        bytes32 referrerCodeHash; // Hash of the referral code domain\r\n        uint256 deadline;\r\n        bytes32 nonce;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Modifiers ============\r\n    modifier onlyController() {\r\n        if (!controllers[msg.sender] && msg.sender != owner())\r\n            revert NotController();\r\n        _;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    constructor(address _signer, address _nameWrapper, address _baseRegistrar) {\r\n        if (_signer == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        if (_nameWrapper == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        if (_baseRegistrar == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n\r\n        signer = _signer;\r\n        nameWrapper = INameWrapper(_nameWrapper);\r\n        baseRegistrar = IBaseRegistrar(_baseRegistrar);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Admin ============\r\n\r\n    function setSigner(address _signer) external onlyOwner {\r\n        if (_signer == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        emit SignerUpdated(signer, _signer);\r\n        signer = _signer;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setNameWrapper(address _nameWrapper) external onlyOwner {\r\n        if (_nameWrapper == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        nameWrapper = INameWrapper(_nameWrapper);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setBaseRegistrar(address _baseRegistrar) external onlyOwner {\r\n        if (_baseRegistrar == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        baseRegistrar = IBaseRegistrar(_baseRegistrar);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function setController(\r\n        address controller,\r\n        bool allowed\r\n    ) external onlyOwner {\r\n        if (controller == address(0)) revert InvalidAddress();\r\n        controllers[controller] = allowed;\r\n        emit ControllerUpdated(controller, allowed);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Core Functions ============\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Check if a referrer still owns their referral code domain\r\n    function isReferrerValid(\r\n        bytes32 referrerCodeHash,\r\n        address originalReferrer\r\n    )\r\n        public\r\n        view\r\n        returns (bool valid, address currentOwner, string memory reason)\r\n    {\r\n        uint256 tokenId = uint256(referrerCodeHash);\r\n\r\n        // Check current owner\r\n        try nameWrapper.ownerOf(tokenId) returns (address owner) {\r\n            currentOwner = owner;\r\n        } catch {\r\n            return (false, address(0), \"Domain does not exist\");\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Check if expired\r\n        uint256 expiry = baseRegistrar.nameExpires(tokenId);\r\n        if (block.timestamp > expiry) {\r\n            return (false, currentOwner, \"Referral domain expired\");\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Check if still owned by original referrer\r\n        if (currentOwner != originalReferrer) {\r\n            return (false, currentOwner, \"Referrer no longer owns domain\");\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return (true, currentOwner, \"\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Process referral for NEW registrations (requires signature)\r\n    function processReferral(\r\n        ReferralData calldata data,\r\n        bytes calldata signature,\r\n        uint256 totalPrice,\r\n        address token,\r\n        bool isFiat\r\n    ) external payable onlyController returns (uint256 paidAmount) {\r\n        // Skip if no referrer\r\n        if (data.referrer == address(0)) {\r\n            _refundExcess(token);\r\n            return 0;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Validations\r\n        if (data.referrer == data.registrant) revert SelfReferral();\r\n        if (block.timestamp > data.deadline) revert ExpiredSignature();\r\n        if (usedNonces[data.nonce]) revert NonceAlreadyUsed();\r\n\r\n        // Verify signature (now includes referrerCodeHash)\r\n        bytes32 messageHash = keccak256(\r\n            abi.encodePacked(\r\n                data.referrer,\r\n                data.registrant,\r\n                data.nameHash,\r\n                data.referrerCodeHash,\r\n                data.deadline,\r\n                data.nonce,\r\n                block.chainid,\r\n                address(this)\r\n            )\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        bytes32 ethSignedHash = ECDSA.toEthSignedMessageHash(messageHash);\r\n        address recoveredSigner = ECDSA.recover(ethSignedHash, signature);\r\n\r\n        if (recoveredSigner != signer) revert InvalidSignature();\r\n\r\n        // Mark nonce as used\r\n        usedNonces[data.nonce] = true;\r\n\r\n        // Store referral relationship permanently\r\n        if (domainReferrals[data.nameHash].originalReferrer == address(0)) {\r\n            domainReferrals[data.nameHash] = ReferralInfo({\r\n                referrerCodeHash: data.referrerCodeHash,\r\n                originalReferrer: data.referrer\r\n            });\r\n            emit ReferrerAssigned(\r\n                data.nameHash,\r\n                data.referrerCodeHash,\r\n                data.referrer\r\n            );\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Calculate payout\r\n        uint256 pct = referralCount[data.referrer] >= BONUS_THRESHOLD\r\n            ? BONUS_PCT\r\n            : BASE_PCT;\r\n        paidAmount = (totalPrice * pct) / 100;\r\n\r\n        // Increment referral count and track earnings\r\n        referralCount[data.referrer]++;\r\n        totalEarnings[data.referrer] += paidAmount;\r\n\r\n        // Process payment\r\n        _processPayment(data.referrer, paidAmount, token, isFiat);\r\n\r\n        emit ReferralPaid(\r\n            data.referrer,\r\n            data.registrant,\r\n            data.nameHash,\r\n            paidAmount,\r\n            token,\r\n            isFiat\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        return paidAmount;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Process referral for RENEWALS (checks if referrer still owns their domain)\r\n    function processRenewalReferral(\r\n        bytes32 nameHash,\r\n        uint256 totalPrice,\r\n        address token,\r\n        bool isFiat\r\n    ) external payable onlyController returns (uint256 paidAmount) {\r\n        // Look up stored referral info\r\n        ReferralInfo memory info = domainReferrals[nameHash];\r\n\r\n        // No referral relationship exists\r\n        if (info.originalReferrer == address(0)) {\r\n            _refundExcess(token);\r\n            return 0;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Check if referrer still owns their referral code domain\r\n        (\r\n            bool valid,\r\n            address currentOwner,\r\n            string memory reason\r\n        ) = isReferrerValid(info.referrerCodeHash, info.originalReferrer);\r\n\r\n        if (!valid) {\r\n            emit RenewalReferralSkipped(\r\n                nameHash,\r\n                info.referrerCodeHash,\r\n                info.originalReferrer,\r\n                currentOwner,\r\n                reason\r\n            );\r\n            _refundExcess(token);\r\n            return 0;\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // Calculate payout\r\n        uint256 pct = referralCount[info.originalReferrer] >= BONUS_THRESHOLD\r\n            ? BONUS_PCT\r\n            : BASE_PCT;\r\n        paidAmount = (totalPrice * pct) / 100;\r\n\r\n        // Track earnings (don't increment referral count for renewals)\r\n        totalEarnings[info.originalReferrer] += paidAmount;\r\n\r\n        // Process payment\r\n        _processPayment(info.originalReferrer, paidAmount, token, isFiat);\r\n\r\n        emit RenewalReferralPaid(\r\n            info.originalReferrer,\r\n            nameHash,\r\n            info.referrerCodeHash,\r\n            paidAmount,\r\n            token,\r\n            isFiat\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        return paidAmount;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Refund any excess ETH/tokens sent\r\n    function _refundExcess(address token) internal {\r\n        if (token == address(0)) {\r\n            if (msg.value > 0) {\r\n                (bool refunded, ) = payable(msg.sender).call{value: msg.value}(\r\n                    \"\"\r\n                );\r\n                require(refunded, \"Refund failed\");\r\n            }\r\n        } else {\r\n            uint256 balance = IERC20(token).balanceOf(address(this));\r\n            if (balance > 0) {\r\n                IERC20(token).safeTransfer(msg.sender, balance);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Internal payment processing\r\n    function _processPayment(\r\n        address referrer,\r\n        uint256 paidAmount,\r\n        address token,\r\n        bool isFiat\r\n    ) internal {\r\n        if (isFiat) {\r\n            pendingFiatEarnings[referrer] += paidAmount;\r\n            untrackedFiatEarnings += paidAmount;\r\n        } else if (token == address(0)) {\r\n            require(msg.value >= paidAmount, \"Insufficient ETH for referral\");\r\n\r\n            (bool success, ) = payable(referrer).call{value: paidAmount}(\"\");\r\n            if (!success) revert TransferFailed();\r\n\r\n            uint256 excess = msg.value - paidAmount;\r\n            if (excess > 0) {\r\n                (bool refunded, ) = payable(msg.sender).call{value: excess}(\"\");\r\n                require(refunded, \"Excess refund failed\");\r\n                emit ExcessRefunded(msg.sender, excess);\r\n            }\r\n        } else {\r\n            uint256 balance = IERC20(token).balanceOf(address(this));\r\n            require(balance >= paidAmount, \"Insufficient tokens for referral\");\r\n\r\n            IERC20(token).safeTransfer(referrer, paidAmount);\r\n\r\n            uint256 excessTokens = balance - paidAmount;\r\n            if (excessTokens > 0) {\r\n                IERC20(token).safeTransfer(msg.sender, excessTokens);\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /// @notice Batch distribute fiat earnings\r\n    function distributeFiatEarnings(\r\n        address[] calldata referrers,\r\n        uint256[] calldata amounts\r\n    ) external payable onlyOwner {\r\n        require(referrers.length == amounts.length, \"Length mismatch\");\r\n\r\n        uint256 totalDistributed = 0;\r\n\r\n        for (uint256 i = 0; i < referrers.length; i++) {\r\n            address referrer = referrers[i];\r\n            uint256 amount = amounts[i];\r\n\r\n            if (amount > pendingFiatEarnings[referrer]) {\r\n                amount = pendingFiatEarnings[referrer];\r\n            }\r\n\r\n            if (amount > 0) {\r\n                pendingFiatEarnings[referrer] -= amount;\r\n                totalDistributed += amount;\r\n\r\n                (bool success, ) = payable(referrer).call{value: amount}(\"\");\r\n                require(success, \"Transfer failed\");\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        untrackedFiatEarnings -= totalDistributed;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ View Functions ============\r\n\r\n    function getReferralPct(address referrer) external view returns (uint256) {\r\n        return\r\n            referralCount[referrer] >= BONUS_THRESHOLD ? BONUS_PCT : BASE_PCT;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function getDomainReferralInfo(\r\n        bytes32 nameHash\r\n    )\r\n        external\r\n        view\r\n        returns (\r\n            bytes32 referrerCodeHash,\r\n            address originalReferrer,\r\n            bool isCurrentlyValid,\r\n            address currentCodeOwner,\r\n            string memory validityReason\r\n        )\r\n    {\r\n        ReferralInfo memory info = domainReferrals[nameHash];\r\n        referrerCodeHash = info.referrerCodeHash;\r\n        originalReferrer = info.originalReferrer;\r\n\r\n        if (originalReferrer != address(0)) {\r\n            (\r\n                isCurrentlyValid,\r\n                currentCodeOwner,\r\n                validityReason\r\n            ) = isReferrerValid(referrerCodeHash, originalReferrer);\r\n        }\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function verifySignature(\r\n        ReferralData calldata data,\r\n        bytes calldata signature\r\n    ) external view returns (bool) {\r\n        bytes32 messageHash = keccak256(\r\n            abi.encodePacked(\r\n                data.referrer,\r\n                data.registrant,\r\n                data.nameHash,\r\n                data.referrerCodeHash,\r\n                data.deadline,\r\n                data.nonce,\r\n                block.chainid,\r\n                address(this)\r\n            )\r\n        );\r\n\r\n        bytes32 ethSignedHash = ECDSA.toEthSignedMessageHash(messageHash);\r\n        return ECDSA.recover(ethSignedHash, signature) == signer;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // ============ Emergency ============\r\n\r\n    function withdrawStuckETH() external onlyOwner {\r\n        (bool success, ) = payable(owner()).call{value: address(this).balance}(\r\n            \"\"\r\n        );\r\n        require(success, \"Withdraw failed\");\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    function withdrawStuckTokens(address token) external onlyOwner {\r\n        IERC20(token).safeTransfer(\r\n            owner(),\r\n            IERC20(token).balanceOf(address(this))\r\n        );\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    receive() external payable {}\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0xf711898d8945ecbc5833baf43147b55eccb96230dedb5dc16508403293b0cba8","license":"MIT"},"contracts/registry/ENS.sol":{"content":"//SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT\r\npragma recordExists(bytes32 node) external view returns (bool);\r\n\r\n    function isApprovedForAll(\r\n        address owner,\r\n        address operator\r\n    ) external view returns (bool);\r\n}\r\n","keccak256":"0x6da2391392332c8b089076a8a67505ccd429079b4a7a69aa676f9026cc1ca16f","license":"MIT"},"contracts/resolvers/Resolver.sol":{"content":"//SPDX-License-Identifier: bytes(s).length;\r\n        for (len = 0; i < bytelength; len++) {\r\n            bytes1 b = bytes(s)[i];\r\n            if (b < 0x80) {\r\n                i += 1;\r\n            } else if (b < 0xE0)                i += 5;\r\n            } else {\r\n                i += 6;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n        return len;\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    /**\r\n     * @dev Escapes special characters in a given string\r\n     *\r\n     * @param str The string to escape\r\n     * @return The escaped string\r\n     */\r\n    function escape(string memory str) internal pure returns (string memory) {\r\n        bytes memory strBytes = bytes(str);\r\n        uint extraChars = 0;\r\n\r\n        // count extra space needed for escaping\r\n        for (uint i = 0; i < strBytes.length; i++) {\r\n            if (_needsEscaping(strBytes[i])) {\r\n                extraChars++;\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        // allocate buffer with the exact size needed\r\n        bytes memory buffer = new bytes(strBytes.length + extraChars);\r\n        uint index = 0;\r\n\r\n        // escape characters\r\n        for (uint i = 0; i < strBytes.length; i++) {\r\n            if (_needsEscaping(strBytes[i])) {\r\n                buffer[index++] = \"\\\\\";\r\n                buffer[index++] = _getEscapedChar(strBytes[i]);\r\n            } else {\r\n                buffer[index++] = strBytes[i];\r\n            }\r\n        }\r\n\r\n        return string(buffer);\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // determine if a character needs escaping\r\n    function _needsEscaping(bytes1 char) private pure returns (bool) {\r\n        return\r\n            char == '\"' ||\r\n            char == \"/\" ||\r\n            char == \"\\\\\" ||\r\n            char == \"\\n\" ||\r\n            char == \"\\r\" ||\r\n            char == \"\\t\";\r\n    }\r\n\r\n    // get the escaped character\r\n    function _getEscapedChar(bytes1 char) private pure returns (bytes1) {\r\n        if (char == devdoc.details: Supports USDC-only payments, ERC-4337 Account Abstraction,      Circle Paymaster for gasless transactions, and optional AA wallet deployment.      No renewal functions - all registrations are lifetime (100 years). Key Features: - ETH and USDC payments - EIP-2612 permit for gasless USDC approval - ERC-4337 Account Abstraction compatible - Optional AA wallet deployment with domain mint - Works with Circle Paymaster for gas sponsorship

NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
